Content:
So I bought myself this xl350 yesterday and it runs very well but wiped out taking a corner on loose gravel and now it s leaking oil from left crankcase cover (as seen in picture)
Looked at some exploded views of the engine but cant figure out what is supposed to go here. Any help is appreciated
